snippet: Researchers have found what happens to muscles when a masseur goes to work on them.
abstract: Researchers have found what happens to muscles when a masseur goes to work on them.
lead_paragraph: A massage after vigorous exercise unquestionably feels good, and it seems to reduce pain and help muscles recover. Many people -- both athletes and health professionals - have long contended it eases inflammation, improves blood flow and reduces muscle tightness. But until now no one has understood why massage has this apparently beneficial effect.
